alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Lincoln (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 10:56PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wood, southeastern Lincoln, central Marathon and west central Langlade Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1056 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Merrill to 14 miles northwest of Rib Mountain to 7 miles east of Colby to near Spencer to 11 miles southeast of Shortville. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Merrill and Council Grounds State Park around 1100 PM CDT. Wausau around 1115 PM CDT. Rib Mountain and Pittsville around 1125 PM CDT. Mosinee around 1145 PM CDT. Weston around 1200 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Sandhill Wildlife Area, Edgar, North Wood County Park, Big Eau Pleine County Park, Ackley Wildlife Area, Moon, Little Chicago, Auburndale, March Rapids and Hamburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
